Class Server

java.lang.Object
ocsf.server.AbstractServer
server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
Main class that extends AbstractServer OCSF server class that handles client communication, interacts with the database controller, and updates the JavaFX GUI via ServerUI.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamen Abu Ahmad

      public static final int DEFAULT_PORT
      Default port number for server connections.
      See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(int port, ServerFrameController ui)
      Constructs a new Server instance with the specified port and UI.
      Parameters:
      port - the port number to listen on for client connections
      ui - the server user interface for displaying messages

  • Method Details

    • setDatabaseConfig

      public void setDatabaseConfig(String dbName, String dbUser, String dbPassword)
      Configures the database connection parameters.

      This method must be called before starting the server to set up the database connection information.

      Parameters:
      dbName - the name of the database
      dbUser - the username for database authentication
      dbPassword - the password for database authentication
